channel.title: RSC Remake
channel.description:
Hello,
Well recently since the map editor was rewrote and works perfect and fast to build maps I thought I would get back into rsc server development and rewrite the rsc server to try move knowledge/Stability/Features and etc on with the times up to date with java.. Rscd was made around 2005-2007 we have a whole new network of features what we can do to preform the server and cycles of players/Npcs faster than rscd has done..
Before the start of the project I was going to work on the 204 engine and decided why stay the same? Can't we be unique and wind jagex up and write one for the 230 engine? After a bit of research on the new login protocol jagex has implanted into rsc it was simple to recreate (Login Packet, UID, Create Packet) (Cred Packet, User, Pass, RSA, ISSAC, send packet)
While working on the server I've thought ok then.. be unique yet again and build a update server for the server to... (When client loads checks the crc32 of the cache at the time being if it has changed or the client has been updated will auto download it)
At the time being I am at my other halfs and can not post pictures of the server (Login, Multiplayer etc) But I did set up a JSP webserver on it to outprint the time online how many players online and the memory and cpu usage of the server I am running it on
Crap server Intel Core Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40 GHz Memory 2gb..
The out print is now on [code]Time Online: 8 Days 12 hours 59 mins Players Online: 1955 CPU Usage: 11% Memory Usage: 24%[/code]
I will be setting up a account registering system on that to..
create a server with it? god knows lol.
Btw the 1955 players are bots.. Logging in all the time spamming chat packets cutting trees and etc..

item.description:
@Vengeance_e wrote:

[quote=“uberpk3r, post:21, topic:376266”][quote author=hm wtf lol xD link=topic=472198.msg3455789#msg3455789 date=1294020707]

post some updates/pics. Even though I doubt you’ll finish it, for some reason
everyone that says they are gonna do something in this section never finishes it.
[/quote]Completing it would actually take a while seeming as What I am doing is a lot of rewriting to the client and etc but I am home soon so that’s when I put up the svn and etc

You do realize that no 1 would actually play your server? your rumors are not better then mine.
But go ahead and waste your time on a silly game.[/quote]
T X has better reputation than you do, so I bet he DOES get players. Me atleast.
It’s not wasting time, it’s having fun while learning something thats usefull for your future(If you are interested in programming)

item.title: RSC Remake
item.dc:creator: @hm_wtf_lol_xD hm wtf lol xD
item.description:
@hm_wtf_lol_xD wrote:

[quote=“RLN, post:3, topic:376266”]sounds cool but… how many people does such a server need to handle with the limited number of people left in this scene?.. with rsce consuming a lot of these users and the rest going for pking servers. But hey, atleast you realised theres not much need for more map editors[/quote]There is actually a lot of need for map editors they give you ideas what to do and what you can do next… Building your own area…What you can do in that area and etc.

Maybe but it is always best to have your ass covered with idea’s I’ve got and the knowledge I no… I can make rsc not like rsc and bring it to are own kind of game.

Read full topic
